subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Diana Taurasi scored 23 points and Tangela Smith added 16 as the defending champion Phoenix Mercury jumped to a 19-point lead in the first quarter and beat the host San Antonio Silver Stars, 92-73.
snippet: Diana Taurasi scored 23 points and Tangela Smith added 16 as the defending champion Phoenix Mercury jumped to a 19-point lead in the first quarter and beat the host San Antonio Silver Stars, 92-73.
